meanings.definition: A plant of the cabbage family with thick, fleshy, edible leaves.
meanings.sent1: The seakales in the garden have green, succulent leaves.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy cooking seakales with garlic and butter.

meanings.definition: The leaves of the seakale plant, used as a vegetable.
